description.en: There is a total supply of 100 billion PAKO tokens of which 2.8% has been appointed to the dev-wallet for marketing and coverage of other future costs. This is done to benefit the project and bring more overall value to the table. 60% of the supply has been used for the pre-sale of which 75% is locked for seven months, which will be extended when expired. The remaining 33.2% will be provided to the liquidity pool and 4% has been used to pay fees.
